title: Silver V > 9 Game Losing Streak
body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=bunny

I'm getting a little disheartened to keep playing ranked. In no way do I think I'm a great player  but I also don't think I'm a terrible player. I generally do the best on my team every game but all the other lanes seem to go 0/5 and 1/7 and so on. 

I don't know if this is just me or the way that the matchmaking system works or if it broken, I don't know. But 9 games is so rough. Last season I Gold V but got demoted due to inactivity and I never had this issue in that tier. Is anyone else experiencing this sort of matchmaking? If so please comment below so if there is an issue with matchmaking Rito can fixo. 

Thanks

replies.body:
Now Bunny,
I know it sucks, but if you are always the best on your team you will climb. It may take a lot longer then a guy next to you who is at the exact same Elo as you. Meaning it's the nature of the game. Iv got a mate who has made gold every time since season 2. He's currently silver 3 and played a lot of games. He's not worried cos ge know ls he will get there. But may have to play a lot or a few games to get there. Like I said it's the nature of the game in solo que.
Thank you! I seem to have gone past my losing streak and are on a win win loss ratio, or at least 50/50! Which I'll take! Haha, thank you again <3

I was master tier 220 lp then this happened
https://gyazo.com/b56cd547d9f31ef06202c2167abc05bc        6 losses 1 win
https://gyazo.com/63cd01d70dc16a0665c11028dc08362c    21 losses
https://gyazo.com/2b2626587649540e1e0b18e92145fb6c      1 win 6 losses

straight to diamond 5 

https://gyazo.com/27c15f97f0d5c3db46e14c70b9249661

its ok buddy, its like the kids in Africa, when you think you've got it bad there will be someone out there who probably has it worse. still i know your pain.    {{item:3070}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3040}}

Yeah that's unbelievable. Feels you bro.

21 - that's beyond rough. 

I don't think I'll ever complain again... well I probably will but still.
